content:
That's wonderful! I'm so glad to hear that Ava and Olivia have a special connection to Ethiopia through their birth country. It's great that they have a personal connection to the culture and heritage of the country, and I'm sure they'll be excited to share their story with you during your trip.

It's also wonderful that Emily has given them a loving home and is helping them maintain their connection to their roots. International adoption can be a beautiful way to build families, and it's clear that Emily has done an amazing job of raising Ava and Olivia with love and respect for their heritage.

I'm sure your kids will have a blast at the zoo and amusement park! Those are always great ways to get kids excited about exploring a new place. And who knows, maybe Ava and Olivia can even share some of their favorite childhood memories or traditions from Ethiopia with your kids during your trip.

Remember to also take some time to explore the local markets and try some of the delicious Ethiopian cuisine during your trip. Injera, tibs, and misir wot are all yummy options that kids might enjoy. And don't forget to try some of the traditional Ethiopian coffee, too!
